message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above $750000. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid $750000 is still a bit below my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair value for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $825000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
